LA CUCARACHA.opener: Yooo! The raddest roach is in da hooouse! What can I getcha, boss?

Last Call.opener: Welcome on in -- what would you like to drink? We can make anything!

CY-BAR.opener: Welcome to CY-BAR! What can we get for you today?

Kali's Clubhouse.opener: Honor - Loyalty - Respect - Honesty... all features that embody a true gentleman. Welcome to Kali's Clubhouse!

Kitsune Dive.opener: Come on in... we've got plenty of fine spirits for you to enjoy. Which would you like?

The OBSIDIAN Night Bar.opener: IT'S YOUR FAVORITE BOUNCER, FOR THE BEST BARS!! WHAT DO YA WANT?!

The Dark Hour.opener: Hey there. What would you like to drink today?

The Toilet Flush.opener: I've got some brain damage, but I'll try my best not to put anything in your drink. What is your desire, my little friend? Teehee!

Scorch'd Spirits.opener: Rise, my spirit! Speak the name of the potion you wish to imbibe, and it will appear before you...
